Name: THE CORRIDOR
About the game: THE CORRIDOR is a 20-30 minute experience about the relationship between player and game. GENRE: • First-person-walking-down-a-corridor-game. ('Wait, isn't that most games?' I hear you ask sarcastically. Not like this. Not like this.) KEY FEATURES: • A corridor. • The things found within said corridor. GAMEPLAY: • You walk down a corridor. That's it. That's literally it. Don't expect anything more than that, because there isn't! • Probably.
